sentences.english: An Asian Games decoration with its mascot is displayed in front of the media village in the Asian Games Town.
sentences.chinese: 亚运村媒体村前展示着一个亚运会的吉祥物装饰。

sentences.english: We are finding the way to Guangzhou Asian Games Village, Can't you tell me ?
sentences.chinese: 我们正在找路回亚运村呢，你可以帮我们吗？

sentences.english: The Asian Games Village Automobile Exchange is the biggest car dealership in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 亚运村汽车交易所是北京最大的汽车经销代理商。

sentences.english: Finally no alternative but to choose and buy a high volume of residential.
sentences.chinese: 最后没办法，只好又到亚运村买了容积率很高的住宅。

sentences.english: The company locates on Asian Sports Village, a downtown area in Beijing, next to the landmark Bird's Nest.
sentences.chinese: 公司在北京繁华地区亚运村，毗邻地标型建筑鸟巢。

definition: Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
Fengtai inner district of southwest Beijing
abbr. for 國際貿易|国际贸易[guo2 ji4 mao4 yi4]

Chaoyang inner district of Beijing/Chaoyang district, Changchun city, Jilin
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
